tuv.seg: Mobility Aids Grant Scheme
An Scéim Deontas Áiseanna Soghluaisteachta

The Mobility Aids Grant Scheme provides grants for works designed to address mobility problems in the home, such as the purchase and installation of grab-rails, a level access shower, access ramps or a stair-lift
Cuireann an Scéim Deontas Áiseanna Soghluaisteachta deontais ar fáil i gcomhair oibreacha bunúsacha atá deartha chun tabhairt faoi fhadhbanna soghluaisteachta sa bhaile
The scheme is primarily for older people, but people with a disability can also apply for it
Mar shampla, is féidir an deontas a úsáid chun greimráillí, cithfholcadán boinn leibhéalta, rampaí rochtana nó ardaitheoir staighre a cheannach agus a chur isteach
If you need more extensive works done, or if you do not qualify under the means test, you can apply for the Housing Adaptation Grant for People with a Disability instead
Is ar dhaoine níos sine atá an deontas seo dírithe, ach is féidir le daoine faoi mhíchumas tairbhe a bhaint as an scéim freisin
Depending on your situation, the Housing Aid for Older Persons Scheme may be more suitable for you

Má tá oibreacha níos leithne le déanamh agat, nó muna cháilíonn tú faoi thástáil mhaoin na scéime seo, d'fhéadfá cur isteach ar an Deontas Oiriúnaithe Tithe do Dhaoine faoi Mhíchumas nó ar an Scéim um Chúnamh Tithíochta do Dhaoine Breacaosta

These 3 schemes are administered by local authorities, under the Housing (Adaptation Grants for Older People and People With A Disability), Regulations 2007, which were amended by new Regulations in 2014
Riarann na h-údaráis áitiúla an 3 scéim seo, faoi Rialacháin 2007 agus Rialacháin 2014
You can apply for a refund of VAT on the aids and appliances that you need
Is féidir iarratas a dhéanamh ar aisíocaíocht CBL maidir leis na háiseanna agus na gléasanna a mbíonn de dhíth ort
This refund scheme also applies to the cost of the installation work
Baineann an scéim aisíocaíochta seo le costas na hoibre suiteála freisin
The Mobility Aids Grant Scheme is available to people with a household income of less than €30,000 per year
Tá fáil ar an deontas do dhaoine ag a bhfuil uasioncam teaghlaigh níos ísle ná €30,000
The grant can be paid to people in:
Is féidir é a íoc le daoine a bhfuil cónaí orthu sna cinéalacha tithíochta a leanas:
• Houses being purchased from a local authority under the Tenant Purchase Scheme
• Tithe atá á gceannach ó údarás áitiúil faoin scéim cheannaigh ag tionóntaí
• Private rented accommodation (the duration of your tenancy can affect grant approval)
• Cóiríocht atá ar cíos go príobháideach (is féidir le marthanacht do thionóntachta tionchar a bheith aige ar fhaomhadh a fháil ar an deontas)
• Accommodation provided under the voluntary housing Capital Assistance and Rental Subsidy schemes
• Cóiríocht atá curtha ar fáil faoi na scéimeanna tithíochta deonacha an Scéim Tacaíochta Caipitil agus an Scéim um Fhóirdheontais Cíosa
• Accommodation occupied by people living in communal residences
• Cóiríocht atá áitithe ag daoine atá ina gcónaí in árais chomhchoiteanna
You must satisfy the local authority that you will occupy the property as your normal place of residence when the works have been done
Caithfidh an t-údarás áitiúil bheith sásta go mbeidh gnáthchónaí ort sa theach tar éis na n-oibreacha
If you are a tenant, you must also get written approval from your landlord
Más tionónta tú, caithfidh tú faomhadh scríofa a fháil ó do thiarna talún
Your application for the grant will be prioritised according to your medical need
Tabharfar tús áite do d'iarratas bunaithe ar riachtanas leighis
Highest priority will be given to people who are terminally ill, or where alterations or adaptations would facilitate their discharge from hospital or the continuance of care in their own home
Tabharfar an tús áite is airde do dhaoine a bhfuil tinneas foirceanta ag dul dóibh nó sa chás go bhféadfaí duine a scaoileadh abhaile ón ospidéal dá ndéanfaí athruithe/oiriúnuithe
When the local authority receives your application, it may request an occupational therapist's (OT) assessment
Nuair a fhaigheann an t-údarás áitiúil d'iarratas, is féidir go n-iarrfadh sé measúnú ó theiripeoir saothair (TS)

The local authority can arrange for this, or you can employ an OT yourself and recoup up to €200 of the cost from the local authority as part of the grant, subject to the maximum grant limit of €6,000

Is féidir leis an údarás áitiúil measúnú TS a eagrú, ach is féidir leat féin TS a fhostú chun measúnú a dhéanamh, agus suas le €200 forchúiteamh a fháil mar chuid den deontas iomlán suas go dtí uasmhéid an deontais (€6,000)
Your total household income is assessed to find out if you qualify for the grant and at what level of assistance
Déantar measúnú ar d'ioncam teaghlaigh iomlán chun a fháil amach an bhfuil tú incháilithe don deontas, agus má tá, ag cén leibhéal cabhrach
• The property owner's (or tenant’s) annual gross income, together with their spouse’s or partner’s annual gross income in the previous tax year
• Ollioncam bliantúil úinéara na réadmhaoine (nó an tionónta i gcás áitreabh príobháideach ar cíos) agus an chéile/pháirtí sa bhliain cíosa roimhe sin
• The income of any other adults living in the household who are aged over 23 years if in full-time education, or aged over 18 if not in full-time education
• Ioncam atá ag aon duine fásta eile sa theaghlach, os cionn 23 bliana má tá siad in oideachas lán-aimsearach, nó os cionn 18 bliana munal bhfuil
The following is not taken into account when calculating your household income:
Ní thógtar an méid seo a leanas san áireamh nuair atá ioncam do theaghlaigh á ríomh:
• €5,000 for each member of the household aged up to 18 years
• €5,000 do gach duine den teaghlach atá faoi 18 bliana d'aois
• €5,000 for each member of the household aged between 18 and 23 years and in full-time education or on a SOLAS apprenticeship
• €5,000 do gach duine den teaghlach atá idir 18 agus 23 bliana d'aois agus atá in oideachas lánaimseartha nó ar phrintíseacht SOLAS
• €5,000 where the person to whom the grant application relates is being cared by a relative on a full-time basis
• €5,000 sa chás go bhfuil cúram lánaimseartha á chur ar fáil ag duine muinteartha don té a bhfuil an deontas á sholáthar dó
• Carer's Benefit and Carer's Allowance (if the carer's payment is made in respect of the person to whom the grant application relates)
• Sochar Cúramóra agus Liúntas Cúramóra (má tá íocaíocht an chúramóra á dhéanamh i leith an té a bhfuil an deontas á sholáthar dó)
When applying for the Mobility Aids Grant Scheme, you must provide:
Agus iarratas á dhéanamh le haghaidh deontais, ní mór na rudaí seo a leanas a chur ar fáil:
• Details of your tax district
• Sonraí do cheantar cánach agus
• A statement that, to the best of your knowledge, your tax affairs are in order
• Ráiteas a thugann le fios go bhfuil do chúrsaí cánach in ord, chomh fada agus is eol duit
You must provide evidence that the Local Property Tax on the house has been paid
Ní mór freisin fianaise a chur ar fáil maidir le húinéireacht an tí chomh maith le fianaise gur íocadh an Cáin Mhaoine Áitiúil (LPT) air
There is a relief from Local Property Tax (LPT) on properties that have been adapted for occupation by a disabled person
Tá faoiseamh le fáil ón CMÁ ar mhaoin a oiriúnaíodh le haghaidh áitiú ag duine atá faoi mhíchumas
Read more in our document, Exemptions from Local Property Tax and in Revenue’s guidelines (pdf)
Léigh tuilleadh inár ndoiciméad, Díolúintí ón gCáin Mhaoine Áitiúil agus sna treoracha na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf)
You must include a written itemised quotation from a contractor, indicating the cost of the work required
Ní mór 2 luachan mhiondealaithe scríofa ó chonraitheoir a chur isteach leis an iarratas, agus costas na hoibre luaite orthu
If the local authority considers that this quotation is unreasonable, it will ask you to get another one
Má cheapann an t-údarás áitiúil gur luachan míréasúnta é, iarrfar ort ceann eile a fháil
It is recommended that the proposed works should include the installation of smoke and carbon monoxide alarms, if they are not already present and operating in your home
Moltar go gcuirtear san áireamh san obair atá bheartaithe suiteáil aláraim deataigh agus aláraim aonocsaíd charbóin, mura bhfuil siad suiteáilte agus ag feidhmiú i do theach cheana féin
If you intend to pay more than €650 to a contractor, your contractor may be asked to submit their Tax Clearance Certificate to the local authority
Má tá sé i gceist agat níos mó ná €650 a íoc le conraitheoir, seans go mbeidh ar do chonraitheoir a Dheimhniú Imréiteach Cánach a sheoladh chuig an údarás áitiúil
Starting the work to adapt your home
Tús a chur leis an obair chun do theach a oiriúnú
It is expected that the work will start within 6 months of your grant approval
Beifear ag súil go gcuirfí tús leis an obair taobh istigh de 6 mhí tar éis duit faomhadh a fháil don deontas
If this does not happen, the local authority may allow a time extension
Muna tharlaíonn sé seo, d'fhéadfá breis ama a éileamh ón údarás áitiúil
Applying for a further grant
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar dheontas breise
In general, the work done on your home is expected to be appropriate to your future needs as well as your current needs
De ghnáth, glactar leis go mbeidh an obair a dhéantar i do theach in oiriúint do na riachtanais a bheidh agat amach anseo, chomh maith le do riachtanais reatha
However, if your needs change substantially over time, you may find that further works are required
Má thagann athrú suntasach ar do riachtanais thar tréimhse ama, seans go mbeidh gá le tuilleadh oibre
You can apply again for a Mobility Aids Grant and your application will be assessed in the normal way
Is féidir iarratas a dhéanamh arís le haghaidh Deontas Áiseanna Soghluaisteachta agus déanfar gnáthmheasúnú ar d’iarratas
There is no minimum time limit between the payment of a first and second grant
Ní bhaineann íosteorainn ama leis an tréimhse idir íocaíocht na chéad deontais agus íocaíocht an dara deontas
The maximum grant available is €6,000, which may cover 100% of the cost of the work
Is é an uasdheontas atá ar fáil ná €6,000 agus is féidir leis seo 100% de chostas na hoibre a chlúdach
Note: The maximum amount may not be fully awarded
Nóta: Seans nach níocfar uasmhéid an deontais
Grant amounts are subject to the funding of each local authority, so the local authority can decide whether they pay the full grant or a percentage in each case
Braitheann méid an deontais ar an méid chistiúcháin atá ag an údarás áitiúil – is féidir leis an údarás áitiúil cinneadh an íocfaidh sé an deontas iomlán nó céatadán den iomlán i ngach cás
Download an application form from your local authority’s website or ask for one to be posted to you
Is féidir foirm iarratais a íoslódáil ó láithreán gréasáin d'údaráis áitiúil nó iarraidh orthu forim a sheoladh chugat
The form contains detailed information on the scheme’s conditions and a checklist of documents that you must include
Tá mioneolas ar an bhfoirm faoi choinniollacha na scéime, chomh maith le seicliosta na ndoiciméad atá le cur leis an bhfoirm
If you are unhappy with the local authority’s decision in your case, you can appeal the decision
Muna bhfuil tú sásta le cinneadh an údaráis áitiúil, is féidir achomharc a dhéanamh
The appeal must be in writing and must be made within 3 weeks of the decision
Caithfidh d'achomharc a bheith i scríbhinn agus caithfidh tú e a dhéanamh i 3 seachtaine
You must state the reasons and grounds for your appeal
Scríobh síos cad iad na fáthanna leis an achomharc a dhéanamh
Further information is available from your local authority
Faigh breis eolais ó d'údarás áitiúil
